title: BT Group : Adjusted revenues 2008 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million GBP, containing a total of 12 data points.
Overall Revenue in million GBP has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million GBP is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2015, rapidly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Revenue in million GBP, about 24082.0 was reported at Year 2017, and 2019
Minimum Revenue in million GBP about 17840.0 was reached at Year 2015
